question: The "Mousa Ali Mountain" is located on the tri-point of which three countries?
explanation: Mousa Ali Mountain is a stratovolcano which is 2021 metres above sea level, located at the tri-point of the Tadjourah Region of Djibouti, the Southern Red Sea Region of Eritrea and Afar Region of Ethiopia. This volcano forms the highest point of Djibouti. Denakil Mountain Range forms the parent range of Mousa Ali Mountains. It lies in the northern part of the Great Rift Valley Region.
